overview: Gennie Panguelo, a dedicated Aeta teacher, serves her fellow Aetas at Sitio Tarukan, Capas, Tarlac. She needs to cross rivers, walk for about 3 hours and climb the mountains just to share her learnings with the Aeta community. Despite failing 24 times in taking her licensure exam, she never gave up and has high hopes to pursue her dreams,and be able to impart her knowledge to her students.
title: Titser Gennie
